teal.field

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • teal.field.Field
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Vector3dField
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeField

    public abstract class Field
extends java.lang.Object
implements Vector3dField
    A generic wrapper class for a Vector3dField which gets the potential of the field.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.21 $
    Author:
    Andrew McKinney, Phil Bailey, Michael Danziger

      protected javax.vecmath.Matrix3d computeGradient(javax.vecmath.Vector3d[] F)
      Internal method that actually computes gradient.
      javax.vecmath.Vector3d deltaField(javax.vecmath.Vector3d pos, double stepArc)
      This method returns a normalized vector pointing in the direction of the field at the supplied position.
      javax.vecmath.Vector3d deltaField(javax.vecmath.Vector3d pos, double stepArc, boolean bool)
      Same as deltaField(Vector3d pos, double stepArc), except returns a non-normalized vector.

      Convenience function, calls get(Vector3d x) with a new Vector3d based on the supplied component values.

      Deprecated, calls get(Vector3d x).

      Sets dest to the value of the field at a the specified location, a reference to dest is returned as a convenience.

      Deprecated, calls get(Vector3d x, Vector3d data).

      • getFlux

        public abstract double getFlux(javax.vecmath.Vector3d x)
        This method should return the scalar flux at the supplied position. Flux type is determined by specific Field implementation (EField, BField, etc.).
        Parameters:
        x - location to calculate flux.
        Returns:
        scalar flux at this point.

      • getPotential

        public abstract double getPotential(javax.vecmath.Vector3d x)
        This method should return the scalar potential at the supplied position. Potential type is determined by the specific Field implemtation (EField, BField, etc.).
        Parameters:
        x - position at which to calculate potential.
        Returns:
        scalar potential at this point.

      • get

      • deltaField

        public javax.vecmath.Vector3d deltaField(javax.vecmath.Vector3d pos,
                                         double stepArc)
        This method returns a normalized vector pointing in the direction of the field at the supplied position.
        Parameters:
        pos - position at which to calculate field.
        stepArc - not used.
        Returns:
        normalized vector tangent to field.
